settingProviderDesc: Choose the default LLM vendor; credentials can be configured below.
settingFallbackProvidersDesc: Select backup vendors that are automatically tried when the primary provider fails.
settingAutoSwitch: Auto switch to the last successful provider
settingProviderCredentialsDesc: Configure API keys, default models and base URLs for the selected provider.
settingApiBaseUrlDesc: OpenAI compatible endpoint, for example https://api.openai.com/v1
settingApiKeyDesc: The key is stored locally only. Click the button to test connectivity.
settingModelDesc: Any chat completion model exposed by the gateway.
settingTopPDesc: Alternative sampling control. Keep 1 unless you know what you are doing.
settingMaxTokensDesc: Upper bound for the generated title length.
settingLanguageDesc: Used when rendering the prompt template.
settingToneDesc: Controls how playful, technical or narrative the title should sound.
settingContextStrategyDesc: Choose whether to use selection, the entire document or auto mode.
settingContextLimitDesc: Protects the model from receiving overly long text.
settingDisableThinkingDesc: Disable reasoning/thinking process for faster responses. Supports GLM, DeepSeek, OpenAI o1 and other reasoning models.
settingRetryPolicyDesc: Configure how many retries are attempted before failing over to a different provider.
needApiKey: Please configure an API key in the plugin settings first
needDoc: Open a document before using the assistant
contextUnavailable: No content available for title generation
contextSelectionRequired: Please select some content or switch the context mode
contextBlockUnavailable: Unable to detect the focused block. Click inside the document and try again
emptyResponse: Received an empty response from the model
dialogHint: Preview the generated title below. You can copy it or replace the current document title.
